item.title: CVE-2017-6145|2024-08-05T15:18:49.878Z -- f5%20networks%2C%20inc. -- f5%20big-ip%20ltm%2C%20aam%2C%20afm%2C%20analytics%2C%20apm%2C%20asm%2C%20dns%2C%20link%20controller%2C%20pem%2C%20websafe
item.description: iControl REST in F5 BIG-IP LTM, AAM, AFM, Analytics, APM, ASM, DNS, Link Controller, PEM, and WebSafe 12.0.0 through 12.1.2 and 13.0.0 includes a service to convert authorization BIGIPAuthCookie cookies to X-F5-Auth-Token tokens. This service does not properly re-validate cookies when making that conversion, allowing once-valid but now expired cookies to be converted to valid tokens.
